content:
Angry Orchard is a great choice for the Apple Cider Mimosa. Their ciders are always crisp and refreshing, and they'll pair nicely with the champagne.

And don't forget to have fun with the whipped cream! Adding a dash of pumpkin pie spice will give it a lovely warm flavor that complements the pumpkin puree in the latte perfectly. If you're feeling extra festive, you could even top the whipped cream with a sprinkle of pumpkin pie spice or a few cinnamon sticks.

Remember, the most important thing is to have fun and be creative with your recipes. Don't be afraid to experiment and try new things. And if anything goes wrong, just laugh it off and move on. After all, it's just a dinner party, and it's all about enjoying good food, good drinks, and good company.

If you have any more questions or need any more help, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you have a fantastic time at your dinner party, and I hope your guests enjoy the Apple Cider Mimosas and Pumpkin Spice Lattes!
